Daly_City.Huckleberry House:
Huckleberry House is a shelter for runaway and homeless teens located in San Francisco, California. Huckleberry House was the first runaway shelter for youth in the US, founded during the Summer of Love on June 18, 1967, by several churches and the San Francisco Foundation.
Huckleberry House is operated by Huckleberry Youth Programs and is located at l292 Page St.
